text: Goodou e heheeu be di maa e aha Mee dela hagalee manawa tenetene gi godou haihai tigidaumaha. Idimaa, Mee e iloo Ia bolo goodou guu oho di godou hagababa ne hai gi godou lodo i di godou madagoaa nogo dama daane. Di ahina deenei la di hoo ni oou, gei goe dela guu oho dau hagababa dela ne hai gi mee, ma e aha maa goe gu hagababa i mua o God bolo goe ga manawa dahi ang gi Mee.
